data.description: Mini Hackathon is a competition which gave us a chance to perform our skills and also we gained vast knowledge by participating. We are happy to say that we got many chances to participate in different hackathons organized by different organizations after winning the past Mini Hackathon competition.

Mini Hackathon is the first step on the path of exposure to the new world which helps unlock our new skills to recognize our hidden potential and beyond that was the basis of the big journey of competing in global level competitions like Imagine cup.
It's a great pleasure to be able to participate in Mini Hackathon and become the second runners up. Mini Hackathon opened doors for many other opportunities in the industry.
